trans-unit.source: Represents a single composition operation for transactional composition.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una singola operazione di composizione per la composizione transazionale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> class with the specified parent <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> classe con l'elemento padre specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent of this composition operation.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento padre di questa operazione di composizione.

trans-unit.source: Adds an action to be executed when the overall composition operation completes successfully.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un'azione da eseguire al completamento dell'operazione di composizione.

trans-unit.source: The action to be executed.
trans-unit.target: L'azione da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Adds an action to be executed if the overall composition operation fails.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un'azione da eseguire se l'intera operazione di composizione avrà esito negativo.

trans-unit.source: The action to be executed.
trans-unit.target: L'azione da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Marks this composition operation as complete.
trans-unit.target: Contrassegna come completata questa operazione di composizione.

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> is nested, completion actions will not be executed until the parent composition operation has also completed.
trans-unit.target: Se questo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>è nidificato, azioni di completamento non verranno eseguite fino a quando non sia stata completata l'operazione di composizione padre.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> class, and mark this composition operation as failed.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dall'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> classe e contrassegnare questa operazione di composizione come non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare `Dispose` quando si è terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il `Dispose` metodo lascia la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata `Dispose`, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>in modo da garbage collector di recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>occupata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre `Dispose` prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Saves a key-value pair in the transaction to track tentative state.
trans-unit.target: Salva una coppia chiave-valore nella transazione per tenere traccia dello stato provvisorio.

trans-unit.source: The key to save.
trans-unit.target: Chiave da salvare.

trans-unit.source: The value to save.
trans-unit.target: Valore da salvare.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
